title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
content: https://scarce.city/auctions/sceptre-of-peace-artwork-xcp-1O17lhttps://youtu.be/5d1CFj6TijY?si=2dqHNnsLDFyBrfXKwww.twitter.com/btcmonk1Sceptre of Peace is authentic and one of a kind artwork. It was made from different types of lacquer, 22 carat gold leaf and natural abolone shell.Symbology of the artwork:During these turbulent times when wars are raging around the world in many nations fed by fiat currency, Sceptre of Peace artwork symbolizes different world, led and ruled by Bitcoin and its people, where bullets are of life not of death, what brings to people freedom instead of bondage, rise instead of fall, growth instead of loss and progress instead of regress in all aspects of life;In the past history Sceptre was ornamented staff carried by rulers on ceremonial occasions as a symbol of sovereignty;Two different types of rifles symbolizes military powers of the world;Barrels of the rifles bent into shape of a heart symbolizes the power of Bitcoin which can change the world to a better place.This Lot Includes:Physical ArtworkDimensions: 70 x 62.5 cm (27.5 x 24.6 inch); Weight: 2kg (4.4 lbs)Materials: Foundation was made by putting five layers of black charcoal lacquer on plywood, then it was gilded with more then fifty 22 carat gold leafs. Natural abolone shell was precisely cut in pieces and placed on fresh lacquer before all artwork was covered in five layers of clear lacquer for the finish. Black frame from artificial material.
